description.value:
Aspect shadow

Your relic absorbs light and wraps shadow around you, hiding you in darkness. As long as you are in dim light in an area of shadows, you can attempt a Stealth check to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Hide], even if you aren't @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Concealed] against the creature, such as with a creature with darkvision.
